amendment.description: To ensure that the educational assistance is focused on supporting science, mathematics, engineering, and technology at eligible institutions, and provide for appropriate review of grant proposals.

vote.text: Amendment SA 532 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 532 proposed by Senator Allen. (consideration: CR S5504; text: CR S5504) To ensure that the educational assistance is focused on supporting science, mathematics, engineering, and technology at eligible institutions, and provide for appropriate review of grant proposals.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 532 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 532 proposed by Senator Allen.
